objenome.goal.numeric

Class OptimizeMultivariate<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.NumericSolver<C>
      • objenome.goal.numeric.OptimizeMultivariate<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Solver, org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateFunction

    public class OptimizeMultivariate<C>
extends NumericSolver<C>
implements org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateFunction
    Multivariate Optmization with Multistart which uses different starting points (trying to avoid being trapped in a local extremum when looking for a global one)
    See Also:
    http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-math/javadocs/api-3.3/src-html/org/apache/commons/math3/optim/nonlinear/scalar/MultiStartMultivariateOptimizer.html
